Headline: #22 Clark Temporary Reroute at Racine/Belmont
ShortDescription: 22 Clark buses are temporarily rerouted via Clark, Racine, Belmont and Clark: due to, street blockage near Racine/Belmont.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#22 Clark buses are temporarily rerouted via Clark, Racine, Belmont and Clark: due to, street blockage near Racine/Belmont.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #11 Lincoln Temporary Reroute at Lincoln/Foster
ShortDescription: 11 Lincoln buses are temporarily rerouted via Lincoln, Foster, Western, Bryn Mawr and Lincoln, due to street blockage near Lincoln/Foster.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#11 Lincoln buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Lincoln, Foster, Western, Bryn Mawr and Lincoln, due to street blockage near Lincoln/Foster.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Purple Line Service Running with Delays
ShortDescription: Purple Line trains are running with delays due to to a shortage of available staff; we're working to run as much service as possible. Allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Purple Line trains are running with delays due to a temporary shortage of available staff.

At this time, our operations staff are working to run as much service as frequently and manage service to be spaced as evenly as possible.

Consider other service alternatives that might serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

Allow extra travel time.
